name: Rev Genomics
headline: Rev is a biotechnology company creating better plants.
description: Rev Genomics is a plant biotechnology company that provides breeders, growers, and retailers with novel cultivars to differentiate themselves in high value markets.

# A Biotechnology Company Making Better Plants
Rev Genomics licenses cultivars and intellectual property.
[![Rev Genomics](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1541721743853-8Z7ZORF2DZ6G0C83KWQO/BrowserPreview_tmp-3.png?format=1500w)](https://www.revgenomics.com/</>)
  * [Who We Are](https://www.revgenomics.com/</#whoweare>)/
  * [What We Do](https://www.revgenomics.com/</#whatwedo>)/
  * [Products](https://www.revgenomics.com/</#productsandservices>)/
  * [Technology](https://www.revgenomics.com/</home/#technology>)/
  * [Contact](https://www.revgenomics.com/</#contact>)/


## Who We Are
![rev_bg1.jpg](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542137781758-NCRPF0P4G4C8YIC5KZTD/rev_bg1.jpg)
# We are an Oakland, California plant biotechnology company utilizing cutting-edge breeding tools for high-value crops. Our toolkit includes whole genome selection, advanced tissue culture, molecular genetics and in-house metabolite analytics. With our scientific approach to cultivar development, we have created new cultivars now being commercialized in California. We are backed by[ **Y-Combinator**](https://www.revgenomics.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/?batch=s2017>)**,** and our platform has been featured in [**TechCrunch**](https://www.revgenomics.com/<https:/techcrunch.com/2017/08/22/yc-demo-day-s17-day-2/?_ga=2.73001171.1181547811.1542138110-1745355767.1539266532>).
## What We Do
# Rev Genomics creates high-value crop cultivars that contain valuable biochemicals. We offer breeders, cultivators and seed banks disruptive genomic technology to differentiate their products in ultra-competitive, high value markets. 
![elevate-755051-unsplash.jpg](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542137686441-O8VW3ULDDX1567JIF96D/elevate-755051-unsplash.jpg)
## Products and Services
![rev_illustrations-04.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542128229311-Y5Z1KYU1JFKM18AC6M02/rev_illustrations-04.png)
# Rev Genomics creates novel plant phenotypes and intellectual property for licensing.
![rev_illustrations-05.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542128270882-D3MXKSQ90DKX2V8IMRGF/rev_illustrations-05.png)
# We collaborate with industry partners to provide molecular fingerprints for their unique strains and seeds.
![rev_illustrations-06.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542128329215-DX15INF2SO3FS5JL063I/rev_illustrations-06.png)
# Rev uses advanced tissue culture processes for perfect replication of cultivars.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542128379697-AOF6NW8EWD65PNIYHHIO/image-asset.png)
# Our technology shortens traditional pheno-hunting timelines down to weeks.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542128405895-HN2SS2ASLAND8SYX9NJG/image-asset.png)
# We offer innovative genomics and bioinformatics analysis to bestow un-fair market advantage.
## Technology
# Data Science
Nucleic acid sequencing has been commoditized - it is easy and inexpensive. The difficulty is making biological sense of all the data generated. By using our proprietary Genomics Data Pipeline, we are able to process large amounts of data to tailor the plant breeding process for maximal efficiency. Our process shrinks the time to market, drastically reduces costs associated with cultivar development, and allows for rational phenotype design. 
![BrowserPreview_tmp-7.jpg](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542150540545-LVM39SJFPDTE2424AFGV/BrowserPreview_tmp-7.jpg)
# Advanced Tissue Culture
Most tissue culture programs focus on large-scale propagation of existing strains. At Rev Genomics, however, we are pioneering tissue culture techniques to create true-breeding cultivars that have unique and stable phenotypes. Our approach to tissue culture is not just about manufacturing, but rather high-value trait creation.
![35914344400_44335d235f_o.jpg](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542139555848-1XLDUPNUIVVPNB7R85OF/35914344400_44335d235f_o.jpg)
# Trait Stacking 
Many traits such as yield, growth, and disease resistance are not controlled by a single gene, but rather many genes scattered across the plant genome. Utilizing Whole Genome Selection, we are able to breed and select for numerous traits simultaneously, ultimately stacking useful phenotypes to create game-changing, super cultivars. This methodology is the cornerstone of the Rev Genomics D.A.F. Breeding Platform. 
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542140038147-BFK4IGYTXXBBFR3LYDSR/image-asset.jpeg)
## Leadership Team
![BrowserPreview_tmp-4.jpg](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542128820623-0MVUUVPG8G42K755C4RS/BrowserPreview_tmp-4.jpg)
**Bertrand Vick, PhD**
Co-Founder, CEO
_Experienced biotech entrepreneur; founder of Aurora Algae, a therapeutic oils company that raised over $150M before acquisition in 2015_
 _PhD from UC Berkeley in Molecular and Cell Biology; Management of Technology Certificate from Haas School of Business_
![BrowserPreview_tmp-5.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5bca2c497d0c91050ec20b36/1542128809468-XCRI6ZZRN6HDAN3A9A9N/BrowserPreview_tmp-5.png)
**R.J. Cody Markelz,**
**PhD**
Co-Founder, VP Genomics
_Plant systems biologist specializing in physiology, growth, statistics and quantitative genomics_
 _PhD in Plant Biology from University of Illinois – Urbana-Champaign, 4.5 years post-doc research at UC Davis_

generated_description:
**Rev Genomics: Crafting the Future of Plants**

Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S17, Rev Genomics is an innovative biotechnology venture based in Oakland, California. The company is on a mission to create better plants, focusing on high-value crop cultivars that contain essential biochemicals. With a small but mighty team of eight, Rev Genomics employs cutting-edge techniques in plant breeding, leveraging tools like whole genome selection and advanced tissue culture to deliver novel cultivars. 

### Who They Are
Rev Genomics positions itself at the intersection of agriculture and genomics. Their scientific approach encompasses a diverse toolkit—from molecular genetics to in-house metabolite analytics—allowing them to develop unique and commercially viable plant varieties. They cater to breeders, growers, and retailers by providing them with technologies that differentiate their offerings in competitive markets.

### What They Do
Their core offering revolves around creating high-value cultivars designed for specific biochemicals, which help partners stand out in the crowded agricultural landscape. They collaborate with partners to deliver molecular fingerprints for unique strains and seeds, effectively streamlining the process of cultivar development. This includes an efficient pheno-hunting process that dramatically reduces timelines from months to mere weeks.

### Technology Overview
Rev Genomics relies heavily on data science to make sense of the immense amount of biological data gathered through nucleic acid sequencing. Their proprietary Genomics Data Pipeline optimizes the plant breeding process, minimizing costs and time involved while supporting rational phenotype design. Their advanced tissue culture techniques not only replicate existing cultivars but also foster the creation of true-breeding plants with distinct traits. They leverage the concept of trait stacking to enhance multiple characteristics, from yield to disease resistance, promoting the emergence of ‘super cultivars.’

### Leadership
Rev is helmed by co-founders Bertrand Vick, PhD, an experienced biotech entrepreneur, and R.J. Cody Markelz, PhD, a specialist in plant systems biology. Together, they bring a wealth of knowledge and an ambitious vision for the future of plant biotechnology.

For more details about Rev Genomics, check out their website [here](https://www.revgenomics.com). If you have any inquiries about products and services, you can reach them at sales@revgenomics.com or call (510) 325-0484. 

In a world increasingly reliant on sustainable agriculture and innovative biotechnological solutions, Rev Genomics is positioning itself as a leader, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in plant genetics and cultivars.
